column2: Made a loaf of homemade bread and followed the recipe to a T. It was dynamite. The entire loaf was finished at dinner. Melted butter and garlic to drizzle over top right before it was served.
So easy and flavorful. Loved the garlic, caper and lemon combo. Served it with Tyler's Smothered Pork Chops.
Easy, tasty, bright taste. An easy side dish for weeknight cooking.
Delicious! Especially loved the lemony flavor.
This was ok - nothing really special but at the same time it wasn't horrible. Not something I'd make again though.
This was the best turkey Iâ€™ve ever had! My family agrees! The citrus takes any of the gaminess out of the turkey. It was super flavorful and moist.
